title: Plain vegetable stir fry
ingredients: ['5 mushrooms, sliced', '1 red pepper, sliced into strips', '1 carrot, sliced', '4 tablespoons finely chopped shallot or purple onion', '5 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 handful fresh Thai basil leaves', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'fish sauce or soy sauce, to taste']
